data.title: PASSIONS: Jason47's "Passions" Tribute: 1999-2008
data.meta_description: Please take a look at my two tributes to "Passions": my new tribute to the last year of "Passions" on DirecTV at http://members.aol.com/jason47/passionsdirectindex.html for a montage of pictures of the entire cast and some final farewells and my original tribute to the NBC years available here: h...
data.text:
Please take a look at my two tributes to "Passions": my new tribute to the last year of "Passions" on DirecTV at http://members.aol.com/jason47/passionsdirectindex.html for a montage of pictures of the entire cast and some final farewells and my original tribute to the NBC years available here: http://members.aol.com/jason47/passionsindex.html It's been a lot of fun keeping track of all 2,233 episodes over the past 9 years. Hope you've enjoyed the stats, and the show! Jason47

Below are the stats for August 2008, Overall 2008, Overall DirecTV, and the final stats for the overall run of the series (7/5/99-8/7/08).

Thank you, Jason! I want you to know that every month I have looked forward to your monthly Passions stats. You are so skilled in keeping up with everything and I thank you for that. One thing I can say is that I have no problem with how high or low any person on that list is. Everything looks as it should be to me.

And Jason, I'm curious. I've always known you to be strictly about the facts and numbers and everything but I've never heard your thoughts on Passions for the most part. What are they?
